text: Jitia Herod gyaani manu khan pora taike thogaise koi kene janise, tai bisi khong uthise. Etu nimite tai laga sipahi khan ke pathaikena jiman dui saal pora niche mota bacha Bethlehem te ase, sobke morai dibole hukum dise. Kilekoile utu somoite Jisu jonom koi kene dui saal ase koi kene Herod khobor paikena thakise.
